data.text:
Stacey Dash is an American actress and talk show host born in , well-known for her feature film .

She was born on , to a single mom Linda Dash and grew up with her sibling Darien Dash, CEO of . She pursued an education at but couldnât make it up to University. Dash belongs to African-American Ethnicity of Mexican descent and holds an American Nationality.

Stacey initiated her acting career with the TV series and debuted in big-screen movies from . Her incredible acting skill in the teen series won the heart of millions of people and she came into the limelight.

SOURCE: Instagram

Dash gave her outstanding performance in TV series like , and in Movies including , etc.

Stacey Dash's diligent performance earned her several awards and trophy as well was also nominated for for . She is also very active on social media and shares her viewpoint on Politics and entertainment talks through Twitter.

Regarding her personal life, Stacey is currently single but has been through several affairs and married thrice. She married Brian Lovell, James Maby, and Emmanuel Xuereb but all of her relationships couldnât last for more than a couple of years.

She has a son Austin from Christopher Williams, an R&B singer, and a daughter Lola from James Maby. She was once caught in a controversy after she passed a hateful comment on Transsexuals, and the news picked up a lot of heat after Hari Nef spoke about the issue.

SOURCE: Instagram

Recently, on , Dash ran in in the as a Republican. However, later on, on , she withdrew from the race.

Dash earns a tremendous amount of money from her acting and hosting career but a big chunk of the amount came from Movies. It has been reported that she earns per episode from the TV series by which it has been estimated that her current Net worth is around $8 Million.
